mapper.sql: PERSON_DETAIL_ID, PERSON_NO, FINGERPRINT_NO, PERSON_NAME, PERSON_ALIAS, PERSON_TYPE, PERSON_GENDER, PEROSN_AGE, PERSON_HEIGHT, PERSON_WEIGHT, PERSON_BODY_FEATURE, ID_CARD_FLAG, PERSON_ID_CARD, NO_ID_CARD_DESC, PERSON_CURRENT_ADDRESS, PERSON_RESIDENCE_ADDRESS, PERSON_RACE, PERSON_NATIONALITY, EXIST_FLAG, PERSON_BORN_DATE, PERSON_DEATH_DATE, PERSON_FRONT_PICTURE, PERSON_SIDE_PICTURE, PERSON_REMARK, CREATE_DATETIME, CREATE_PERSON, UPDATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_PERSON, DELETE_FLAG, DELETE_DATETIME, DELETE_PERSON, DELETE_REASON, PERSON_FRONT_PICTURE_PATH
mapper.update: UPDATE PERSON_DETAIL SET PERSON_NO=#{personNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FINGERPRINT_NO=#{fingerprintNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PERSON_NAME=#{personName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PERSON_ALIAS=#{personAlias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PERSON_TYPE=#{personType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PERSON_GENDER=#{personGender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PEROSN_AGE=#{perosnAge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PERSON_HEIGHT=#{personHeight,jdbcType=REAL}, PERSON_WEIGHT=#{personWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, PERSON_BODY_FEATURE=#{personBodyFeature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ID_CARD_FLAG=#{idCardFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PERSON_ID_CARD=#{personIdCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NO_ID_CARD_DESC=#{noIdCardDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PERSON_CURRENT_ADDRESS=#{personCurrentAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PERSON_RESIDENCE_ADDRESS=#{personResidenceAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PERSON_RACE=#{personRace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PERSON_NATIONALITY=#{personNationality,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXIST_FLAG=#{existFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PERSON_BORN_DATE=#{personBornDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PERSON_DEATH_DATE=#{personDeathDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PERSON_FRONT_PICTURE=#{personFrontPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PERSON_SIDE_PICTURE=#{personSidePicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PERSON_REMARK=#{personRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATETIME=#{createDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_PERSON=#{createPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATETIME=#{updateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_PERSON=#{updatePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELETE_FLAG=#{deleteFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELETE_DATETIME=#{deleteDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DELETE_PERSON=#{deletePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELETE_REASON=#{deleteReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE PERSON_DETAIL_ID = #{personDetailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
